column5: $102.58 for three years now..
You won't get a reminder and many licences will expire on new year's.  https://www.ontario.ca/page/renew-replace-or-update-outdoors-card
Mine is one of them. I'd meant to make a note of it on my taado list, but I didn't . Thanks Rob.
Damn thanks Rob.  Guess thats the downside with the 3 year license - forget to check it. Sure enough I'm down to 27 days!
I'm still good for another 2 years.
I'm good for the rest of my life.
Time for me to renew as well. 3 year sport, here I come!
2 years left on mine  Always good to get that reminder though!
Quick tip  Mark it as an event on your phones calander and youll get a notice on the day of
Dec 31 2016. I'm good for another year....but thx for the heads up.
I'm due for a renewal.
Ya, I'm good for another year but a reminder next November/December would be helpful.
I'm good till end of 2016.  Woo Hoo!  After that I will only need to pay for another 2 years.  Then finally I'll be able to fish without the fees!
Ya, I'm good for another year but a reminder next November/December would be helpful.  Rob, I,ll remind you,if I remember.
I was at a Service Ontario centre about 10 days ago and she said Dec 15th and on if doing it in person.
You don't save any money if you buy three years instead of one right?
But you certainly save a lot of hassle. One card... no accompanying paperwork to carry from your one year renewals.
You don't save any money if you buy three years instead of one right?  If they increase the price you will.  But reduced hassel is the main benefit.
Thanks guys.  For years I only did the one year, but makes sense to go with three.
I wish I would have done the three year this time around. I hate carrying the paper license
Still have a year before mine expires, although this thread made me check! lol!  thanks Rob!
That's exactly what I did as well. The 3 year option is convenient but does cause me some concern in early January sometimes.
Mark it on your phone bud?
Useful as long as the same phone is still in my possession next year.
I'll remind you guys next year at this time, providing someone reminds me to remind you!  LOL!
Useful as long as the same phone is still in my possession next year.  Google Calendar, then it doesn't matter what phone you're using at the time.
